import React, {Component} from 'react' import { Card, Button, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import './card_wrap_semantic.scss'; //'url("https://codepo8.github.io/canvas-images-and-pixels/img/horse.png");' class EventCard extends Component{ render(){ return(
{this.props.location} {this.props.time} Momo wants to Have lunch at {this.props.location} {parseInt(this.props.member_count) > 1 ? " with " + parseInt(this.props.member_count) + " other users!" :""}
); } } export default EventCard
